content.text: Let's learn how to use Ollama, shall we? Follow the next steps:
Download Ollama at: https://ollama.com. Install it.
Start Ollama. You should always use it together with Writeopia when you would like to use AI on your computer.
In the section Download Model, you can choose the AI that you would like to use.
Click in the cloud icon and wait for the model to be download.
You can download many models and select between then. You can choose your favorite one and experiment with many of them and discover what is your favorite.
All models run on your computer and your data never goes to the internet. Rest assured: your data is completly private.
